title: Prize winning advertising films: Montecarlo 1955
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television advertising
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising - Awards
description: Five prize winning advertising shorts as follows: 1. Prize for Television commercial films. Sooty the Bear: advertising Oxo extract produced by G. Street, Great Britain. 2. Prizes for puppets, marionettes and models. Mix der Grosse Zauberer: Star mix, an electrical mixer and grinder for kitchen use. Produced in colour by Fischerkoesen Film Produktion, Germany. 3. Pure Beaute: by Alexeieff; advertising Monsavon soap. Produced in colour by Cineastes Production Associes, France. 4. Diploma for entertainment value. The Beach advertising Shell I. C. A. Petrol. Produced in colour by Screenspace, Great Britain. 5. Grand Prix of the Festival. Le Choix de Paris; Jeunes filles en flour; Saloon bar; Le roi des caves Serie Rouge; advertising Vin du Postillon. Produced in colour by Cinema et Publicite.
